Package gameClient

Class Arena

java.lang.Object
gameClient.Arena
public class Arena
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a multi Agents Arena which move on a graph - grabs Pokemons and avoid the Zombies.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Arena.ComparatorValue
    compares between edges, the value of each edge is evaluated by the number of pokemon and their values in each edge.

    • getBestValue

    • getPokemonsOnEdge

      public java.util.LinkedList<Pokemon> getPokemonsOnEdge​(int key)
      Parameters:
      key - a key of a node destination.
      Returns:
      a LinkedList of Pokemon that are standing on this edge.

    • computeStuckProblem

      public int computeStuckProblem​(Agent bond, Pokemon target)
      used especially for fixing the dt fps problem which is happening when the agents are on speed 5. when it happens, the agents are faster than the current data positions, so they can't catch the pokemons and get stuck. this method is used to fix this problem, it counts how many times an Agent is standing on the same edge in row. if the Agent is standing more than 8 time (int statistically), the dt becomes 30 for a short time just to set it free.
      Parameters:
      bond - an Agent.
      target - a Pokemon.
      Returns:
      the number of this this Agent is standing on the same edge in a row.
